name: FNF - Vs. Flippy Full Week
description:
a normal day boyfriend and girlfriend go out in search of some other adversary who is very recognized and highly respected

In this they are told that there is a great boss who usually has extreme changes in his behavior and that he never gives up

this makes boyfriend and girlfriend go in search of the famous flippy

but what the two did not know is that flippy would not see them as normal people...
